tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Got reference from friend but still had lot of hesitation and reservations since I was visiting first time new dentist at a new location,   that too, for  major dental treatment. ( implants and full fixed dentures ) However now my treatment is completed and I am very HAPPY and FULLY SATISFIED with treatment.  I am able to eat as good as I was with my Natural Teeth. Now my family visits her for any Dental advice and treatment. 
 I would strongly recommend Dr Rasleen for any Dental treatment.  
Thanks to Dr Rasleen Ahuja for providing me the best treatment.

Have been to many dentist , but this experience by far is the best experience I have had. 

Dr Anurag Ahuja is attending to me. He makes sure that he puts the patient at ease ( this is very important for me) and explains the procedure in the most easiest way. 

Dr Rasleen Ahuja did my implant procedure today. I Was initially a bit scared that it‚Äôs not Dr Anurag but it went flawlessly . The ease and confidence in which she pulled out the procedure showed her skills.
